titles.title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to authorize services to be provided to individuals with Alzheimer's disease or a related disorder with neurological and organic brain dysfunction who have not attained 60 years of age.
Younger-Onset Alzheimer's Disease Parity Act
Younger-Onset Alzheimer’s Disease Parity Act
Younger-Onset Alzheimer's Disease Parity Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
